title: Trump’s Transportation Department is using AI to write regulations.
description:
Google’s Gemini, in particular, according to ProPublica, citing internal communications. The regulations don’t even have to be that good, officials say; “We don’t need the perfect rule on XYZ. We don’t even need a very good rule on XYZ,” one official is reported to have said. This will surely end well.
[Link: Government by AI? title: In Depth: Tencent Bets Its AI Future on 28
description: In Depth: Tencent Bets Its AI Future on 28-Year-Old From OpenAI - Vinces Yao Shunyu takes charge of the Chinese tech giant’s artificial intelligence infrastructure and large language model development as the industry enters a new, application-focused phase
content:

title: "Much More Complex": Ex-Spain Coach Robert Moreno Reacts To Rumours On Using AI To Manage

description: Kyly Clarke has resorted to artificial intelligence to promote her artwork.
content:

title: AI tutors to be rolled out to UK schools in just two years in bid to help needy pupils
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) tutors will be made available to schools in just two years, the Government has confirmed.
content:
Teachers and AI labs will work together to create tuition tools using the new tech this summer, with a view to rolling them out before the end of 2027.

title: EU Probes Musk's AI Chatbot Grok Over Sexual Deepfakes
description: After his artificial intelligence chatbot Grok spewed nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on X, the European Union opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's social media platform on Monday.
content:
The European Union opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's social media platform X on Monday after his artificial intelligence chatbot Grok spewed nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on the platform.
